item.title: Alura Skimo - Power BI Dashboard
item.description: Tools used: Power BI, Figma, SQL Category: Dashboard This dashboard is the last out of three from the second Alura Challenge BI. Alura Skimo is interested in analyzing their sales data, to help with this I made this dashboard. It’s composed of three pages. The first one presents a summary of all the main measures you’ll find in the dashboard, filtered for the most recent month. On this first page, you can also rest your mouse cursor over a measure and it’ll show a small plot with the historical series with a tendency line.
